pkgmetadata.longdescription: **django-ca** is a tool to manage TLS certificate authorities and easily issue and revoke certificates. It isbased `cryptography <https://cryptography.io/>`_ and `Django <https://www.djangoproject.com/>`_. It can beused as an app in an existing Django project or stand-alone with the basic project included. Everything can bemanaged via the command line via `manage.py` commands - so no web server is needed, if youâ€™re happy with thecommand-line.Features:#. Set up a secure local certificate authority in just a few minutes.#. Certificate revocation via CRLs and OCSP.#. Certificate issuance via ACMEv2, command line, web interface or REST API.#. Management via command line and/or via Django's admin interface.#. Get email notifications about certificates about to expire.#. Written in Python 3.8+, Django 3.2+ and cryptography 41.0+.Please see https://django-ca.readthedocs.org for the most recent documentation.
